TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. However, that stuff is a virus that kills all Flareons. Yay!

I wish 8 stupihuf.

Granted, stupihuf vanishes.

I wish to live on the mars one settlement.

Ps. Any true wish someone had the guy who had the wish would accept it no matter the consequences

Granted. Your life is extremely boring, tedious due to mandatory daily exercise, and boring again because all you're doing is collecting science and waiting for your solar panels & superfarm to fail.

I wish Mars had more than science and boring (& iron oxide)

Granted, it is now filled with intelligent, giant, venomous spiders, too.

I wish the Honor Harrington books were made into movies.

Granted! But All the copies of the movies are made of antimatter!

I wish to engineer a pandemic. Without killing mah army

Granted. It's a pandemic that just happens to turn into antimatter in the last stage of infection. It doesn't kill your army, but because of the destruction of all the air they die anyway. Also their fires go out.

I wish for double cupckaes!

Granted! It's also a GIANT cupcakes. But... Mah Flareon Army jumps out and arrests you.

We play this music while in your prison:

I wish for...

Granted, but it corrupts you as a result.

I wish for a punkin pie with whipped cream.

Edit: I apparently wasn't on the last page... but this works too.

Edited May 15, 2014 by K3achas

Granted!: The punkin pie is a Micheal Bay pie. It explodes.

I wish for a supermassive black hole for my Flareon army.

My army can't be killed or hurt.

Granted. It's a punkin chunkin pie with whipped cream. It has lots of grass in it. (YOU FLAREON NINJA JERKHOLE)

Granted. It sucks them in. Their information is contained, but they cannot get out. Any ships you try to put in are spaghettified.

I wish that bees werre oaor35sr

Edited May 15, 2014 by Tangle

Granted. 35 bees are users, but all of them are trolls, little kids, and spammers.

I wish for a star cannon, like in terraria.

(Also, for fallen stars to come out of the sky)

Granted, but your friend test fires the cannon while you are out in front of it. You survive by ducking your head away just in time, but then a falling star hits you.

I wish that I was Bob Kerman.

Edited May 15, 2014 by VelocityPolaris

Granted. The omnipotent glowing white light at the fourth wall decides to separate you from Jebediah. He then flings you into the sky, & into the sun.

No free will.

That wasn't in wish format, so it won't be granted.

I wish for another St. Lucia's flood.

Granted. Instead of another St. Lucia's flood, you get global warming. And it will happen. Very many years after you ask for it. Nobody is killed.

I wish for free will to no longer exist. (People without free will would wish for this if given a wish)

Granted.....in another universe.

I wish my Sailor army on Eve could turn Eve into anti-demon safehouse before this thread hits page 666 .And get those flareons in there too, will ya? Me and Fyre are in a freindship.

Granted, but the safehouse isn't Mudkip-proof, and I destroy it with my Mudkip-mobile. Mudkipz.

I wish mudkipz.

Granted. Mudkips become officialy lame in the year 2015. SWEET, SWEET REVENGE.

I wish exactly 1,000,000 mudkips died of Chuck Vorheez Krueger the Ripper.

Edited May 15, 2014 by Souper

Granted. 100^999^999 more take their place.

I wish super took off his helmet on the Mun.

Granted. Oops, i am a , and therefore immune to vaccuum.

I wish for a giant lazor beam that can destroy Equestria (i HATE MLP)

Granted, but you're beamed down to the planet just before it fires.

I wish that someone would tell me what the difference between a laser and a phaser is.

Granted. The difference is too much for me to tell you.

I wish the game Slenderman included a character called "splendorman"

Edited May 15, 2014 by Tery215

Granted, and he refuses to kill you, but the static field destroys your electronics.

I wish I could swallow pills.

Granted The next pill you ingest morphs you into Joseph Merrick.

I wish......Minecraft?!?!?!

Granted, the chair or other thing you're sitting in now has extremely sharp edges and is really blocky.

I wish for 0.24
